title: How To Build A Sleep Routine For You And Your Children
description: Getting enough sleep helps you focus, retain information and helps to fortify your immune system. For parents and caretakers struggling to get their little ones to bed on time, here are tips on establishing healthy sleeping habits — that can benefit your entire family.
copyright: Copyright 2019-2021 NPR - For Personal Use Only
itunes:title: How To Build A Sleep Routine For You And Your Children
itunes:author: NPR
itunes:summary: Creating healthy sleeping habits starts from having a consistent routine. This can include anything you and your family need from a specific bed time to an optimal bedroom setup.
itunes:subtitle: Creating healthy sleeping habits starts from having a consistent routine. This can include anything you and your family need from a specific bed time to an optimal bedroom setup.
